description:
Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Verpasse keine Live-Spiel im Fernsehen oder Stream!

Im Sender-Dschungel wird es immer schwieriger, kein Spiel deiner Lieblingsmannschaft zu verpassen. Welches Spiel läuft auf Prime oder DAZN? In der Länderspielpause wird das Testspiel deines Teams auf dem Youtube-Kanal des Gegners übertragen? Das Top-Spiel wird kurzfristig live im Fernsehen gezeigt? Hier verpasst du nichts mehr!

** 5 Sportarten in einer App
Früher hatten wir separate Apps z.B. für Fusball oder Football. Aber viele Nutzer sind nicht nur Fan von einer Sportart. Deshalb haben wir hier die 5 größten Sportarten nun zusammen in einer App:

* Fußball
Natürlich haben wir alles rund um den beliebtesten Sport Deutschlands. Bundesliga, Zweite Bundesliga, Dritte Liga, Regionalliga, DFB-Pokal, Junioren etc. Dazu die internationalen Wettbewerbe wie Champions League, Europa League, Europa Conference League, etc. sowie die Liga- und Pokalspiele der Big 5, also neben Deutschland auch Premier League, FA Cup, Ligue 1, Coupe de France, La Liga bzw Primera Division, Copa del Rey, Serie A, Coppa Italia uvm.

* Football
Natürlich ist die NFL als wichtigste Sportliga der Welt vertreten. Aber auch z.B. College Football, USFL, WNFC und XFL. Und selbstverständlich auch die German Football League sowie die European League of Football.

* Volleyball
Neben der Ersten und Zweiten Bundesliga und dem DVV-Pokal findest du hier auch die Spiele der Champions League und des CEV-Cups, und auch Beach-Volleyball nimmt einen prominenten Platz ein.

* Basketball
Nicht erst seit dem ersten WM-Titel für Deutschland 2023 boomt Basketball in Deutschland. Wir hatten natürlich auch vorher schon Bundesliga, Zweite Liga und BBL-Pokal im Programm, ebenso wie EuroCup und EuroLeague. Und selbstverständlich dürfen die amerikanischen Ligen NBA, WNBA und College nicht fehlen.

* Eishockey
Auch im Eishockey ist die amerikanische Liga das Maß aller Dinge. Aber neben der NHL ist natürlich auch die Deutsche Eishockey Liga mit DEL und DEL2 ebenso vertreten wie die Champions Hockey League.

* Alle Geschlechter
Für alle diese Sportarten gilt natürlich: Auch wenn die Männer-Wettbewerbe in den meisten Ligen mehr Zuschauer anlocken, nehmen selbstverständlich auch die Wettbewerbe der Frauen bei uns in allen Sportarten einen sehr prominenten Platz ein!

** Vorteile der App
* Kostenlos
Du kannst die Funktionen der App kostenlos nutzen! Um sie für dich persönlich anzupassen, z.B. deine Lieblingsteams hervorzuheben, kannst du dich kostenlos registrieren, aber das ist total freiwillig. Du kannst die App auch ohne Registrierung problemlos nutzen.

* Lieblingsteams hervor heben
Suche deine Lieblingsteams aus, quer über die oben genannten Sportarten, und die Spiele dieser Teams werden dir bevorzugt angezeigt.

* Sportarten auswählen
Wähle deine Sportarten, und mit nur 1 Klick kannst du alle Spiele der anderen Sportarten ausblenden.

* Kategorien aussuchen
Du kannst auch innerhalb der Sportarten deine Kategorien auswählen und alle anderen Spiele mit nur 1 Klick ausblenden.

*Pay-TV und Free-TV
Das Erste, ZDF, die dritten Programme, Livestreams auf Youtube, DAZN, Sky, DYN, Sportdeutschland, ORF, SRF, und viele mehr

* Sender ausblenden
Du kannst in deinen persönlichen Einstellungen definieren, welche Sender dir angezeigt werden sollen. Die Spiele auf anderen Sendern kannst du mit 1 Klick ausblenden.

* In eigenen Kalender integrieren
Die Termine deiner Lieblingsteams kannst du mit nur 1 Klick als separaten Kalender erstellen den du ganz einfach in deinen bestehenden Kalender bei Google, Apple, Outlook etc. einbinden kannst. Natürlich musst du die Einbindung nur 1 Mal machen und danach wird der Kalender automatisch täglich aktualisiert.

* Deine Lieblingsteams sind dabei
Wir haben über 1.000 Fußball-Teams, über 200 Football-Teams, über 300 Basketball-Teams, ebenfalls über 300 Volleyball-Teams sowie fast 300 Eishockey-Teams. Falls da tatsächlich dein Team des öfteren live übertragen wird und nicht dabei ist, sag uns einfach Bescheid.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

Mobilis est une application pour la lecture de fiction, dédiée à servir tous les amateurs de fiction! Nous avons une variété de thèmes, y compris la fantaisie, les arts martiaux, la romance, l'histoire urbaine, le campus et bien plus encore. Tout ce que vous pouvez imaginer est ici! Nous mettons à jour la librairie quotidiennement, libérant de nouveaux chapitres en quelques secondes. Cela ne pourrait pas être plus pratique pour les lecteurs! Et nous avons également divers événements qui vous attendent! Nous continuons à réviser nos contenus, pour être votre compagnon de lecture le plus proche. 
Nous avons des - 
【Fictions massives】 Couvre des fictions en ligne populaires avec diverses listes et une classification fine, y compris une section masculine et féminine, des livres sélectionnés, des recommandations intelligentes et plus encore! 
【Expérience de lecture de qualité】 Personnalisez votre lecture avec le tournage de page 3D simulé, le téléchargement hors ligne, le changement de police, le fond et le mode nuit. Nous présentons des couvertures de livres exquises, une mise en page de contenu soignée et de nombreux autres designs délicats pour assurer une bonne expérience. 
【Service personnalisé】 Diverses couleurs d'arrière-plan, polices fines. Réglez votre lecteur personnel d'un simple clic. 

【Synchronisation intelligente】 La progression de la lecture et les notes peuvent être synchronisées de fa?on intelligente et enregistrées dans votre compte. Pas besoin de vous soucier de changer d'appareil. 


à propos des abonnements renouvelables automatiquement 
- Les abonnements auto-renouvelables dans l'application incluent des packs de pièces d'enregistrement et des plans d'adhésion VIP.
- Période de facturation: les packs de pièces d'enregistrement sont disponibles sur une base mensuelle, trimestrielle et annuelle. Facturation mensuelle et trimestrielle pour les plans d'adhésion VIP.
- Prix: Les frais des packs de pièces d'enregistrement pour une période de facturation mensuelle sont de 7  et 13 USD, une période de facturation trimestrielle de 20 et 38 USD et une période de facturation annuelle de 60 et 98 USD. 
Les frais d'adhésion VIP pour une période de facturation mensuelle sont de 7 et 18 USD, une période de facturation trimestrielle est de 20  et 48 USD et une période de facturation annuelle est de 60 et 190 USD.

- Paiement: L'achat sera débité de votre compte iTunes. 
- Renouvellement: lorsque vous vous abonnez à un pack de pièces d'enregistrement, votre abonnement se renouvelle automatiquement. Vous serez facturé au début de chaque cycle de facturation jusqu'à ce que vous annuliez votre abonnement. Les abonnements sont automatiquement facturés pour chaque période de facturation, mensuelle ou autre, et vous pouvez être facturé dans les 24 heures avant le début de chaque période de facturation. 
- Annulation: Vous pouvez annuler un abonnement à tout moment au moins 24 heures avant votre date de renouvellement.

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br

Discover the YouScribe App
With the YouScribe app, you can explore a vibrant library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, podcasts, and more! Choose your favorite titles, build personalized reading lists, and stream thousands of works on your phone, tablet, or laptop. You can even enjoy your library offline—anytime, anywhere.

Why You’ll Love YouScribe

A dynamic library to match your interests
- A unique catalogue spanning over 120 themes: novels and short stories, sci-fi, romance, thrillers, personal development, professional resources, and much more.
- Learn and level up with lessons, theses, research papers, essays, and technical or professional documents.
- Smart recommendations to help you discover local and international hits tailored to your taste.
- Multi-format reading—seamlessly switch between text and audio on mobile, tablet, or computer.

Your portable, personalized library
- Offline mode: download and read anywhere, even without an internet connection.
- Automatic sync: pick up right where you left off, on any device.
- Reading comfort: dark mode, adjustable fonts, bookmarks, sleep timer, and more.
- Advanced search: find exactly what you’re looking for in seconds.
- Customized collections: create your own themed shelves and reading lists.
- Community connection: follow your favorite authors and their new releases.
- Personalized experience: receive tailored notifications about new content and features.

How It Works
YouScribe is available in more than 25 countries and offers a constantly expanding catalogue of local and international titles in over 11 languages.
Your subscription gives you unlimited access to our regularly updated library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, newspapers, and more.
Subscriptions made through the app are billed to your Apple account and renew automatically at the end of each period, unless you turn off auto-renewal in your Apple account settings at least 24 hours before renewal.
If a free trial is available, you’ll need to provide a payment method when signing up—but don’t worry! You won’t be charged if you cancel before the trial ends.
The catalogue, languages, and subscription options may vary by region. Some titles or offers mentioned here may not be available in your country or plan.

Our Commitments
For the price of a single book, enjoy unlimited access to our entire catalogue—and cancel anytime.
We partner with publishers, authors, and creators around the world to bring you a living library that reflects you and your world.
Whether you love reading at night, listening during your commute, or taking a break in the middle of the day—YouScribe is there for you, wherever and whenever inspiration strikes.

Download the app today and open the door to thousands of stories, skills, and discoveries.

Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES

Bonne lecture !

Mensuel indépendant, Philosophie magazine offre un éclairage philosophique de l'actualité dans toutes ses dimensions (société, sciences, politique, arts…), une réflexion sur les grandes questions de l'existence, et un accès à l'oeuvre des philosophes, de l'Antiquité aux contemporains. 

Il s'adresse à tous les lecteurs, à ceux qui sont n'ont que de très vagues souvenirs du cours de terminale, comme aux amoureux de la philosophie. Il cultive l'éclectisme des sujets, la variété des formats (enquêtes, débats, entretiens, chroniques, recensions de livres, BD….), mais aussi la profondeur. Chaque numéro comprend deux grands dossiers, l'un sur un thème contemporain, l'autre sur un philosophe, dont un texte majeur est présenté dans un cahier séparé. 

Lancé en 2006, Philosophie magazine a été élu "meilleur nouveau magazine" en 2007 et "magazine de l'année" en 2010 (prix du Syndicat de la Presse Magazine). 

# Abonnements

Vous pouvez vous abonner au mensuel depuis l'application pour 1 an (10 numéros). Cet abonnement n'inclut pas les hors-séries.

L'abonnement d'un an est reconduit automatiquement sauf si vous désactivez cette option au moins 24h avant la fin de la période en cours. L'abonnement et son renouvellement peuvent être gérés à partir de votre compte dans l'App Store.

Déjà abonné à la version numérique de Philosophie magazine ?
Pour en bénéficier sur votre iPhone ou votre iPad, insérez votre numéro d'abonné à l'aide du menu « code ou numéro d'abonné ».

• Conditions générales : https://abo.philomag.com/cgv
